title: The life and death of the Reuerend Father, and faithfull seruant of God, Mr. William Cowper, Bishop of Galloway who departed this life at Edenburgh, the 15. of February. 1619. Whereunto is added a resolution penned by himselfe, some few dayes before his death, touching the Articles concluded in the late generall Assembly holden at Perth. 1618.
author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
publisher: Printed by George Purslowe for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Greene-Dragon,
